description: Perfect for spring or summer, these bircher muesli pots replace the traditional oats with freekeh that add a delicious nutty flavour and texture.
name: Freekeh Bircher Muesli Pots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide half thefreekeh and yoghurt mixture equally between 4 serving bowls, glasses, or jars. Top with a layer of half the strawberries and blueberries. Repeat the process adding one more layer of yoghurt and fruit. Sprinkle over some sunflower seeds and add a drizzle of honey before serving.
